Developed Block-chain based native app solution to the problem statement given below under 24 hours during a hackathon under college's technical festival Prometeo. 

Problem statement: 
Solution to store all the medical records along with doctors comments in an organised way, which can be accessed by the doctor only when the patient authorizes. The proposed solution must be secure since, even a minor leak of personal information can create a huge problem for patient as such data is what advertising companies and scammers are after. Thus a secure, reliable and user friendly method must be developed.

What our solution provides:
Security with Block-chain as back-end. Block-chain will ensure the proper security of the user information.
Interactive UI and cross platform solution using React Native as front-end
No requirement of Metamask by using Proof of Authority Consortium which allows for portability and no extra installation needed by the user except the app.
Awesome, lightweight UI components for react native
